name: Peggle Replay File
summary: Learn about .PEG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PEG files are saved be default in the Program Files/PopCapGames/Peggle Deluxe/userdata/replays folder.
NOTE: Peggle Nights saves replays with a .PEGN extension.

description: Saved replay created by Peggle, a 2D peg-clearing game by PopCap Games; stores a video of a previously played game that can be viewed within the Peggle program; can be shared and viewed by other players.
